title: Sunday Night Football Font
content:
Anyone know what font they use for the Sunday Night Football logo? It looked similar to a free font call [Bitsumishi](http://web.archive.org/web/20130207035842/http:/www.dafont.com/bitsumishi.font) but it has some differences. Maybe they just tweaked the letters.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130207035842im_/http:/typophile.com/files/post-1-1159178066_thumb_5559.jpg)
author: jsheldon

comments.content: Could be based on [Dominator](http://web.archive.org/web/20130207035842/http:/pixellogo.com/product.php?productid=16783&cat=333&page=2). For a better G and S try another font like Gotthard.
I think it's part Dominator and part Xirod

[This previous link](http://web.archive.org/web/20130207035842/http:/www.typophile.com/cms/node/40134) from Dec 2007 was not even the first one on this subject.

- Mike Yanega
